roleset.name: Natural Disaster: land based cyclone

role.descr: whirling element; mention of wind or fire

example.name: args 2, 5
example.text: think about being inside an F4 tornado with wind at 218 miles an hour.
example.arg: with wind at 218 miles an hour

example.name: argM-ADJ
example.text: a 1.3 mile-wide tornado tore through Moore, Oklahoma, located 31 miles southeast of El Reno and 10 miles south of Oklahoma City

roleset.note: Added by Julia in a Natural Disaster roleset endeavor. Comparison to twister.

example.name: arg1, 2, ADJ. Fire tornado.
example.text: Ill be really impressed when they have a mile wide F5 fire tornado.
